name: StoreBlogs
tag_list: business-blogs, blogging-services, blog-network, blogger-community, ecommerce-blogs, publishing-platform, storeblogs, storeblogs-com
overview:
StoreBlogs offers a perfect blend of blogging and blog promotion services aimed at anyone who operates an online, internet, web or ecommerce storefront. We offer everything our business bloggers need from the publishing platform to useful tools including themes, plugins and widgets to helpful support documentation, video tutorials, training classes and even optional service upgrades.

Membership is free and open to anyone who owns, operates, works at or manages an online business storefront. Members can create their own ecommerce blog, gain exposure in our blog network, connect with other members in the community, build relationships and much more, all for free.

StoreBlogs gives business bloggers the platform, features and tools needed to promote their store brand, products and services, loyal customers or employees and even themselves.
